Trade/Device Name(s): CRYOcheck Factor VIII Deficient Plasma with VWF
Specimen Container(s): Frozen aliquot vial (1.0 mL or 1.5 mL)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CRYOcheck Factor VIII Deficient Plasma with VWF as a reagent for quantitative FVIII determination in citrated plasma using APTT-based assays
Indications for Use Summary: For clinical laboratory use as a deficient substrate in quantitative determination of Factor VIII activity in 3.2% citrated human plasma via APTT assay; used to identify Factor VIII deficiency and as an aid in management of hemophilia A for individuals aged 2 years and older, for in vitro diagnostic use.
